import React from 'react'; import { ArrowRightIcon, CogIcon, AdjustmentsIcon, ScissorsIcon, KeyIcon, ColorSwatchIcon } from '@heroicons/react/solid'; import logo from '../assests/Alineed_Solutions.gif'; const Home = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* About Us Section */}

About Us

At Alineed Solutions, we specialize in high-quality suitcase repairs, offering expert services to restore your luggage to its best condition. With years of experience and a passion for excellence, we are committed to delivering the best service to our customers.

{/* Our Services */}

Zipper Repairs

Wheel Replacement

Scratch Removal

Lock Repairs

Color Restoration

{/* Why Choose Us */}

Years of Experience

Our team brings years of professional experience to ensure your luggage is repaired efficiently.

Quality Materials

We only use premium materials and components to ensure durability and long-lasting repairs.

Customer Satisfaction

Our top priority is ensuring that our customers are completely satisfied with our services.

{/* Testimonials Section */}

What Our Clients Say

"Alineed Solutions provided excellent service! They repaired my suitcase in no time, and it looks brand new."

— John Doe

"I was so happy with the customization they did for my luggage. Highly recommend their services!"

— Sarah Lee

"Fast, efficient, and great customer service. Will definitely use Alineed Solutions again!"

— Mark Smith

{/* Contact Us Section */}

Contact Us

Need help with your suitcase? Get in touch with us today!

); }; export default Home;
